title: Saint Seiya: Jashin Eris (Saint Seiya the Movie: Evil Goddess Eris)
synopsis: Eris is the goddess of chaos and uses the body of Elien, who is a friend of Hyoga, to revive herself. She obtains the golden apple to drain Athena's life energy to make her ressurection complete and to be able to turn the world in a place filled with chaos. But to be able to attack Eris, Seiya and his friends will first have to defeat the Ghost Knights.
characters: ['Phoenix, Ikki', 'Dragon, Shiryuu', 'Pegasus, Seiya', 'Andromeda, Shun', 'Cygnus, Hyouga', 'Kido, Saori', 'Eris', 'Lyra, Orpheus', 'Sagitta, Maya', 'Aizawa, Eri']
